Producer: Miranda de Pencier, Guy J. Louthan, Charlie Lyons, Vlad Paunescu
Production Co: Plutonium Production Limited, HBO Films, Section Eight Ltd., Beacon Pictures
Synopsis: Dying from radiation poisoning, a man (Paddy Considine) gets mixed up in a plutonium scheme with a small-time criminal (Oscar Isaac).
Title: The Half Life of Timofey Berezin
